name: Team NoCrunch - Collabathon
description:
In this management game, you take control of an indie games studio, and must allocate the members of your team to the correct tasks in order to meet the approaching milestone deadline. Each task doesn't just require one role so choosing the right combination of people to collaborate on each task is key!

Devs:

Parham Sorooshian

Louis Torres Tailfer

Sarah Lanaway

Mentor

Moran Machulsky

Made for the UKIE gamejam 2021
